metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart deals with Viconia after she has been defeated. Different flows for Shar Path and Enemy of Shar path.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto with Shadowheart2. Talk to Viconia3. Win the fight4. Talk to her with Shadowheart nearby

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

26.speaker: Viconia DeVir
26.text: So you think you have won? Time will tell - far easier to claim something than hold onto it.
26.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

33.speaker: Viconia DeVir
33.text: They will turn on you, in time. When you hear the whispers, and see the blades drawn, remember my face.

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.text: I won't remember you at all. Nobody will.

30.speaker: Viconia DeVir
30.text: You know nothing of what lies ahead. Go on - enter the Chamber of Loss. See for yourself.

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.text: Don't worry, Mother. I'll learn from your mistakes.

1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
1.text: Mother. You do not know what awaits you. Go - enter the Chamber of Loss and claim your prize. It may not be what you think.

23.speaker: Shadowheart
23.text: Leave. If you're wise, you'll vanish as if you're dead and buried.

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: Why me? What was all this for?

62.speaker: Viconia DeVir
62.text: Finish it. Send me to Lady Shar's embrace.
62.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: I'm not done with you yet. My parents. Where are they?
5.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

74.speaker: Viconia DeVir
74.text: So blunt - have you forgotten all the interrogation techniques I taught you? Where is the finesse?
74.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: I could demonstrate some techniques, if you insist.
32.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

67.speaker: Viconia DeVir
67.text: Oh I have seen you at work. More than you realise.
67.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

34.speaker: Viconia DeVir
34.text: Your parents are right through that door, in the Chamber of Loss. Where they have been all along. You saw them many times, only we made you forget.
34.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

48.speaker: Viconia DeVir
48.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

22.speaker: Viconia DeVir
22.text: They watched, as we moulded you. They watched. They wept. They bled - often at your hand. It may not be a happy reunion, but it will be a memorable one.
22.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: You're lying. I wouldn't do that.
55.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

59.speaker: Viconia DeVir
59.text: You can see for yourself easily enough. This was all for you, even though you have never appreciated it.

28.speaker: Shadowheart
28.text: Why me? What was all this for?
28.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

13.speaker: Viconia DeVir
13.text: Lady Shar commanded me. And I obeyed. I do not question - I merely act as she wills me to.
13.context: NodeContext: A little thrown by Shadowheart's question. Why ask what is obvious?

75.speaker: Viconia DeVir
75.text: I had an enclave in Waterdeep, you know. Much grander than this. Shar ordered me to raze it, kill all who followed me - claim they betrayed me, when in fact I slew those who showed nothing but loyalty.
75.context: NodeContext: Bitterness creeping in. 'I had it all, and was forced to sacrifice it'

8.speaker: Viconia DeVir
8.text: Shar had me do that, and I did. To cover my tracks. To usher you in.

7.speaker: Viconia DeVir
7.text: Sympathy is for the weak. I merely want to say my piece. I want you to know the cost of your education.

20.speaker: Viconia DeVir
20.text: You became my mission. To take a child of Selûne's most dedicated followers, and turn her over to Lady Shar. To show that all light fades, and darkness will prevail in the end.

39.speaker: Viconia DeVir
39.text: All this was to make you into what the Dark Lady needed you to be - the planning. The training. Those deaths in Waterdeep. It was all to groom you to replace me at her right hand side.

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: Are you sore, Mother Superior? You brought her to the same crossroads you yourself once stood at - but you cannot force her to follow.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: Are you sore, Mother Superior? You brought her to the same crossroads you yourself once stood at - but you cannot force her to follow.

53.speaker: Jaheira
53.text: Are you sore, Mother Superior? You brought her to the same crossroads you yourself once stood at - but you cannot force her to follow.

52.speaker: Minsc
52.text: There was a time when you would flirt with goodness and justice, Viconia - let Minsc and Boo be the last to reject your advances.
52.context: NodeContext: Grim, looking down on Viconia - she once leaned towards redeeming herself, but has fallen too far

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: Leave. Leave and vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: Leave. Leave and vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: Leave. Leave and vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

41.speaker: Viconia DeVir
41.text: I already wish you had - then perhaps you would have demonstrated some of the spine I sought to instil in you. Aluve.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

63.speaker: Viconia DeVir
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH strikes. Viconia speaks to her goddess with her last breath, and falls back, dead.NodeContext: Spoken to her deity in her moment of death

66.speaker: Shadowheart
66.text: I've heard enough - leave. Vanish, or you'll wish I killed you here.

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: Get out of here. If you're wise, you'll vanish for good.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

37.speaker: Viconia DeVir
37.text: Mercy? You were never one of us. Not truly. Aluve.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext: Veiled insult ('you're too soft') ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Finish it? No - I want you to live, having lost everything. Leave.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext:  ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')

21.speaker: Viconia DeVir
21.text: Perhaps you have a greater capacity for cruelty than I credited you with. Aluve.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia gets to her feet and leaves. (Include standing up, but dont worry about her leaving.)NodeContext:  ah-LOO-veh ('I leave you')
